prizes.others: The applicants selected for the acceleration cohort would have the opportunity to seek funding from the set of investors (Angel & VC) who collectively have the appetite to invest USD 1 Million (INR 8+ cr). Besides funding from investors, applicant startups in the cohort stand to get various benefits from the multiple eco-system enablers that would help the startups to grow.
